description.value: Primary Energy: Earth 3 (animating plants to restrain) Supporting Energy: Space 6 (medium range + 20ft square + 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (20-foot square) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 9 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Earth Potential + Earth Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Plants in area animate and grasp at creatures. Creatures in area when cast or entering make [[/save type=reflex]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, target becomes Restrained. Can use action + [[/check skill=athletics]] (2 successes needed) to break free, or repeat save at end of turn (1 success ends effect). Applies Effects: restrained Saving Throw: Reflex (to avoid being grasped) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 round (10ft square), 2 = full effect (20ft square, 1 minute), 3 = 30ft square (10 minutes), 4 = 40ft square (1 hour) Restrained Condition: See conditions document. Target cannot move, has Misfortune on attacks, attackers have Fortune against them, Misfortune on Reflex saves.
